movies.title: Spaceballs
movies.actors: Mel Brooks, John Candy, Rick Moranis, Bill Pullman
movies.plot: Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, David Morse, Michael Clarke Duncan, Bonnie Hunt
movies.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Chris Sarandon, Christopher Guest
movies.plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

movies.title: Top Gun
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards
movies.plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

movies.title: Animal Farm
movies.plot: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

movies.title: Yojimbo
movies.actors: Toshirô Mifune, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa, Isuzu Yamada
movies.plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.
